name: AI UNDER TEST
description:
WHAT IS AI UNDER TEST?


It's a puzzle-like game in which you'll control a robot in the testing phase where you'll have to get to the indicated location by solving the challenges of each level.

STORY


The fear of artificial intelligence is nothing new, but will it always be for the bad? AIX01 is a military robot in the testing phase, where it is accompanied by the engineer responsible for creating the robot. As testing progresses, the creator and creator talk about a variety of topics and the AI ​​becomes increasingly autonomous, until testing is interrupted by external matters.

KEY RESOURCES


  • More than 30 levels.
  • Innovative instruction system.
  • Follow this intriguing dialogue between creation and creator.
  • Think and solve amazing puzzles with different mechanics.



Watch out for the laser beams!!
